item.description:
It's the Sunday after the holidays. Let's go see a comedy. This is 40. You can't go wrong with Paul Rudd as the leading man as his movies are usually very funny.

We will be seeing the 4:50pm show. Get your ticket first and let's meet up around 4:20 in the front movie lobby and then grab our seats.

  • After many years of marriage, Pete (Paul Rudd) is the sole male in a household that includes his wife, Debbie (Leslie Mann), and two young daughters (Iris Apatow, Maude Apatow). As Pete struggles to keep his record label afloat, he and Debbie navigate a three-week course of sex and romance, career victories and financial hardships, aging parents and maturing children. They'll have to learn to forgive, forget and enjoy the rest of their lives -- before they kill each other.
  • Cast: Paul Rudd, Leslie Mann, Megan Fox, Albert Brooks, Chris O'Dowd
  • Director: Judd Apatow
  • Genres: Comedy
  • http://www.fandango.com/amcloewslibertytreemall20_aabbk/theaterpage?date=12/30/2012

The movie comes out on December 21. I will update movie times once they are posted on-line. Buy your tickets online as well so we can all sit together and no one gets left behind. If there is enough of interest, we'll go to either Kelly's or Applebees  which are right by the Liberty Tree Mall and grab a bite after the show.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet inside the front main lobby of the movie theater (Movie theater is inside the Danvers mall).
item.name: Sunday afternoon movie in Danvers MA: This is 40
